CustomField.description: If the Opportunity has reached Shopping phase then time to reach First Entered Shopping, otherwise Opportunity Age
CustomField.formula: IF( First_Shop_to_Close_or_Today__c >0, First_Entered_Shopping_Date__c - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), IF( First_Entered_Shopping_Date__c= NULL, CloseDate - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), TODAY()- DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) )
CustomField.label: Open to Shop or Today
